channel.title: Reviewing Tips on

item.title: Reviewing
item.description: Software engineering is programming integrated over time [1]. The goal of code review is to be continually improving our code. How do you tell if code is better? Correctness Readability Design Style Functionality Complexity Consistency Depending on your experience you may focus on one, many, or all of these. The main question to ask yourself when reviewing code is: Does the pull request improve the existing code? Are there unnecessary changes?
